nodes.text: The Bloody Credit was a GR-75 medium transport that was used as a slave ship during the early years of the Galactic Empire.

The Credit was crewed by 18 Trandoshans, who were formerly mercenaries and had fought for the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. It traveled to the planet Nizon, to transport some Nazren slaves for the Galactic Empire. However, it was attacked by a group of Alderaanian Resistance agents, who attempted to prevent it from leaving Nizon with its cargo.
